long_description: The Carson BugView catcher and magnifier equips your budding young entomologist to easily capture and examine all kinds of many-legged creatures. Thumb-operated slider snares and releases quick-moving bugs with 1-handed ease. Crystal-clear, 5x acrylic magnifier lets ambient light in and allows you to see tiny details up close.
short_description: The Carson BugView catcher and magnifier equips your budding young entomologist to easily capture and examine all kinds of many-legged creatures.
